FAQS.QUESTION: Why Choose us?
FAQS.ANSWER: Having a passion for bespoke furniture, we use only very high-quality materials so ones we completed, your furniture will look beautiful and on the highest quality level. We provide totally bespoke service, your furniture will be designed and created hand-made in our London based workshop by the highly skilled professionals.

FAQS.QUESTION: Do I pay for a visit and for design?
FAQS.ANSWER: The visit will be free. We do not normally charge for measure taking and for the design consultation.

FAQS.QUESTION: How long does it take to make?
FAQS.ANSWER:
Time taken can depend on the number of units and the complexity of the project and as well depend on the type of finishing required. Most projects can be completed within 1-2 weeks, however, please note that it may take up to 4 weeks for some more complexed designs and luxury finishes.

It normally takes us 1-2 days to fit the wardrobes. It may take up to 4 days to fit the kitchen or larger complicated projects.

FAQS.QUESTION: How do you work site?
FAQS.ANSWER: All the furniture we supply is manufactured in our workshop and it is assembled on site which makes it easier and quicker. Some minor works may still be required but we always cover the floor, and we ensure the room is clean and tidy before we leave your home.

FAQS.QUESTION: The room is not yet ready for new furniture. Can I arrange a visit to plan future furniture?
FAQS.ANSWER: If you have plans or if you know the exact dimensions of the space will be fitted, we are more than happy to arrange a visit for a consultation and receive or advice even if you room is not ready.

FAQS.QUESTION: Are you asking for any deposit when the project is agreed before starting?
FAQS.ANSWER: Once you have agreed the furniture order, we will issue a 25% - 35% confirmation deposit.

FAQS.QUESTION: Are you offering the guarantee period?
FAQS.ANSWER: All our work expresses beautiful bespoke furniture hand made using the finest materials, built to last. We offer 10 years guaranty on everything we make.
